DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study continue evaluate long-term effectiveness Magnetic EEG/ECG-Guided Resonance Therapy ( MeRT ) child Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) . No active MeRT treatment perform study .
DOC.brief_title: A Longitudinal Study Safety Efficacy Subjects With ASD Who Received MeRT
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial longitudinal study design evaluate safety efficacy subject Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) receive Magnetic EEG/ECG-Guided Resonance Therapy ( MeRT ) IRB approve clinical trial . A total twenty-eight ( 28 ) subject follow study . After provide informed consent , twenty-eight ( 28 ) subject participate previous protocol observe three ( 3 ) year post-MeRT treatment . During period , subject evaluate 104 156 week post-MeRT treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject must complete MeRT001 ( formerly know MRT001 ) clinical trial conduct Brain Treatment Center ( BTC ) 2 . Age 6 15 year ( day inform consent ) 3 . Willing able adhere study visit 1 . Subjects participate MeRT001 clinical trial . 2 . Any condition judgment investigator would prevent subject completion study .
